name: ARFaceAnchor
desc: An anchor for a unique face that is visible in the front-facing camera.

items.name: var geometry: ARFaceGeometry
items.desc: A coarse triangle mesh representing the topology of the detected face.

items.name: var blendShapes: [ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation : NSNumber]
items.desc: A dictionary of named coefficients representing the detected facial expression in terms of the movement of specific facial features.

items.name: struct ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: Identifiers for specific facial features, for use with coefficients describing the relative movements of those features.

items.name: var leftEyeTransform: simd_float4x4
items.desc: A transform matrix indicating the position and orientation of the face's left eye.

items.name: var rightEyeTransform: simd_float4x4
items.desc: A transform matrix indicating the position and orientation of the face's right eye.

items.name: var lookAtPoint: simd_float3
items.desc: A position in face coordinate space estimating the direction of the face's gaze.
